column4: hi guys, my machine gets its LAN adress via DHCP. I'd like to use other DNS servers than the one provided via DHCP. No way to set router with manual DNS server. IS there a way to prevent /etc/resolv.conf to be updated when dhcpclient get its info ?
look for dhclient.conf if there is one
file exists. What do I look for ?
make a copy first then modify and remove the domain server entries? and see if it modifies your resolv.conf or not
